name: Warriors Of Ragarök
description:
Warriors Of Ragarök is a single player top down real time strategy tower defense game. You have to attack and defend towers to survive. Set in the viking age, hordes are fighting for the realms will you be the dominant realm?

How To Play:
You will have to use your allied towers to send troops to attack the other towers. Each level will contain at least one of realm as an opponent to win the level you must take control of all the towers in that level. You can protect your towers by sending troops to other allied towers or by upgrading your towers so they generate troops faster. Troops are your life source, each tower will generate at least one troop each second, that can be used to attack or support. When a tower is attack the amount of troops the tower has will begin to decrease, if it reaches 0 the tower will be lost to the attacker.

Background:
You play as the protector of the realm Midgard, you must protect Midgard against the other 8 realms. Can you protect Midgard and conquer the other realms.
